#summary Syntax highlighting library and Far Manager plugin

== Introduction ==

Colorer provides source text syntax highlighting services. It colorizes source codes in editor systems (more than 200 syntaxes). Uses powerful HRC format(XML, RE, context free grammas), allowing to support any language.
